simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: An expression which evaluates to a valid encoding name, e.g. to utf-8, utf-16, iso-8859-1, iso-8859-2, windows-1250 etc. As with filename, as long as the expression doesn't contain special characters like braces, brackets, quotes, $, nor @, it is taken as a literal and evaluates to itself.
